text: Me fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itir akar gavgavim kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, “Gumazamizir kamaghɨn amiba, me ivezir kuram inigh arɨmɨghregham.” Gumazir kaba Godɨn akar gavgavim gɨfo, egha me a batogha arazir kurar avɨribagh ami. Egha uaghan me arazir kurar kabarama amir pu. Puvatɨ. Me arazir kurar kabagh amir gumazir igharazibar ziaba fe.
